entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
